name: Moycullen
description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, recteque partiendo ea eum. Ex dolorem prodesset has, nec te admodum accusata dissentiet. Ei mucius graeco aperiri vel, novum putant reformidans sed id. Justo vituperata ad nam, vix voluptua convenire inciderint ut. Mei odio timeam contentiones ea, detracto facilisi vix eu. Mel et consulatu sadipscing.

movements.name: Lead around
movements.description: Gent with his right arm over the lady's shoulder, holding right hand in right and left in left. When arriving home, gents bring their right hand over the lady's head and transition into waltz hold.

movements.name: House around
movements.description: House around the set in waltz hold.

movements.name: Ladies Chain
movements.description: Ladies take right hands in center, turn around the opposite gent with left hands held low, dance back to place passing right shoulders with the opposite lady.

movements.name: Swing
movements.description: In waltz hold.

movements.name: Advance and turn left
movements.description: Taking crossed hands in front, top couples advance and retire once (4b), dance to face the side couple on the left (2b), release hands and tops and sides dance on the spot (2b).

movements.name: Couples square
movements.description: Top couples square with the side couple facing them. Pass right shoulders, turn to face your own partner, pass left shoulders to face the opposite couple again from their side (4b). Top couples pass back through the side couple, pass their partner's left shoulder again, top gents dance to their own places and top ladies cross to the opposite top lady's place (4b). Side couples dance into place.
Ladies cross back home.
Side couples leading. Dance to face the top couples on the left.
Ladies cross back home.

movements.name: House around
movements.description: Full house in waltz hold.

movements.name: Line up
movements.description: With crossed hands top couples advance and retire once (4b) then advance to form a line of four in the center of the set, gents on the outside. Dance last 2 bars on the spot.

movements.name: Turn in the line
movements.description: Gents take right hands low with the opposite lady and dance one full turn (360Â°) clockwise (4b), dance forward to opposite positions, gents to the opposite lady's position and each lady to the opposite gent's (2b). Now pass partners, gents on the inside, facing each other as you change places (2b).
Repeat to return home.
Repeat to return home.

movements.name: Back to back & ladies move on
movements.description: Face your partner and dance back to back, passing by right shoulders when advancing and left shoulders when retiring back to place (4b). Gents dance in place while the ladies dance forward, passing partner's right shoulder then moving on to face the next gent clockwise of their own positions (4b).

movements.name: Swing
movements.description: With new partner in waltz hold.
Repeat until ladies are back home, swinging their original partner.

movements.name: Body
movements.description: In waltz hold using polka steps, step to the center and back (2b), turn clockwise as you move one position to the right (counter clockwise) (2b). Repeat to home.

movements.name: Ladies cross, gents twirl
movements.description: Top ladies cross the set passing left shoulders and take right hands with opposite gent. Ladies dance clockwise around this gent while he twirls his right arm over his head. Finish facing this partner in the opposite lady's position in waltz hold.

movements.name: House around
movements.description: Tops house around each other.
To return home.
To return home.

movements.name: Wheel to opposite
movements.description: Four ladies take right hands and wheel to the opposite position (4b), gents take left hands and wheel to opposite position.

movements.name: Swing
movements.description: In opposite positions.
To return home.

movements.name: Circle
movements.description: Adv & retire twice in a circle holding hands.

movements.name: Diagonal crossover
movements.description: Top ladies cross right shoulders, top gents cross left shoulders, side ladies cross right shoulders and side gents cross left shoulders to end in the opposite positions.

movements.name: Quarter chain & swing
movements.description: Facing your partner, weave forward passing right shoulders with your partner and left shoulders with the next person (4b). Finish facing the third person and swing (4b). You should have moved one position around the set.
Tops always cross first, wherever they are.
Tops always cross first, wherever they are.
Tops always cross first, wherever they are.

movements.name: Chain
movements.description: Face your own partner, take right hands and chain halfway around the set, alternating right and left hands. Dance out the eighth bar in the opposite position, then continue the chain to home.

movements.name: Circle
movements.description: Once, advance again and put arms around each other in Christmas formation (left over and right under).

movements.name: Swing eight / Christmas
movements.description: Swing!
